org.opentcs.access

接口 SharedKernelClient

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    已过时。 
    Use SharedKernelServicePortal instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface SharedKernelClient
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Provides access to a shared kernel.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      已过时。 
       
      Kernel getKernel()
      已过时。 
      Use getPortal() instead.
      KernelServicePortal getPortal()
      已过时。 
      Returns the KernelServicePortal instance being shared.
      boolean isClosed()
      已过时。 
      Indicates whether this instance is closed/unregistered from the shared kernel pool.

    • 方法详细资料

      • close

        void close()
        已过时。 
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        已过时。 
        Indicates whether this instance is closed/unregistered from the shared kernel pool.
        返回:
        true if, and only if, this instance is closed.

      • getKernel

        @Deprecated
Kernel getKernel()
                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        已过时。 Use getPortal() instead.
        Returns the kernel.
        返回:
        the kernel.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If this instance is closed.

      • getPortal

        KernelServicePortal getPortal()
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        已过时。 
        Returns the KernelServicePortal instance being shared.
        返回:
        The portal instance being shared.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If this instance is closed.
